apiDescription: The content management feed allows you to process content for items in bulk. You can take in content via the content feeds. Use the XSDs to manage content.
metaDescription: Walmart is the world's largest retailer, and the Walmart Open API provides access to our extensive product catalog, thus enabling digital businesses to create new and innovative shopping experiences.

parameters.name: feedType
parameters.description: The feed Type

parameters.name: wmConsumerChannelType
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: wmQosCorrelationId
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

parameters.name: wmSvcName
parameters.description: Walmart Service Name

parameters.name: wmSecTimestamp
parameters.description: The Epoch timestamp

parameters.name: wmSecAuthSignature
parameters.description: The vendor's digital signature, generated by running the JAR file or custom generation code

parameters.name: wmConsumerId
parameters.description: A unique ID required to access the API

parameters.name: feedId
parameters.description: A unique ID returned from the Bulk Upload API, used for tracking the Feed File. Special characters must be escaped (e.g., feedId: '...3456@789...' must be entered in the URL as '...3456%40789).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The object response to the starting number, where 0 is the first entity that can be requested.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of entities to be returned. Maximum 20 entities.

parameters.name: wmConsumerChannelType
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: Includes details of each entity in the feed. Do not set this parameter to true.
